title: Mobile Microlearning-Based Motivational Science Education and Transfer Effect Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental scientific theories and learning motivation concepts
context.additional_context: Designed for flexible BYOD-based learning with project-based assessments to achieve knowledge and skill transfer

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct learning strategies by applying motivational science theories to real learning situations.
Learners can improve their self-awareness levels by over 20% through self-reflection activities (e.g., journaling, feedback videos).
Learners demonstrate collaborative and problem-solving skills in team projects grounded in motivational theories.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
